name: Nojiko
text: On Play If your Leader is [Nami], return up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less to its owner's hand.

effect.text: If your Leader is [Nami], return up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less to its owner's hand.

meta.notes: Rarity 'UC' is confirmed from the 'UC' symbol in the bottom right corner. The card is a sample, indicated by the 'SAMPLE' watermark.
